message: Let's start fair. I take 90% and you get 10%.  This is just a starting point, so don't get too attached.
I think a 60/40 split is fair, considering the inflation.  Let's end this here.
I'm willing to go down to 70/30, but I think we can both do better than 60/40.  This is my final offer before I get to make the next proposal.
